posts.post_title: SOLD: 1883 Spalding BB Guide - Dan Brouthers HOF Woodcut  (BGS Auth)
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is an extremely scarce 1883 Spalding Baseball Guide - Dan Brouthers HOF Woodcut page which has been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review enlarged scan for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
